sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar app>
      <v-container>
        <v-row align="center">
          <!-- Left Side: My Store -->
          <v-col>
            <v-btn text class="text-h6">My Store</v-btn>
          </v-col>
  
          <!-- Right Side: Menu Items -->
          <v-col class="d-flex justify-end">
            <v-btn text>Home</v-btn>
            <v-btn text>Shop</v-btn>
            <v-btn text>Cart</v-btn>
  
            <!-- Profile Dropdown -->
            <v-menu
              offset-y
              activator="parent"
              :close-on-content-click="false"
              transition="scale-transition"
            >
              <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                <v-btn text v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">Profile</v-btn>
              </template>
              <v-list>
                <v-list-item @click="editProfile">
                  <v-list-item-title>Edit Profile</v-list-item-title>
                </v-list-item>
                <v-list-item @click="logout">
                  <v-list-item-title>Logout</v-list-item-title>
                </v-list-item>
              </v-list>
            </v-menu>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-app-bar>
  </template>
  
  <script setup>
  function editProfile() {
    // Add your edit profile logic here
  }
  
  function logout() {
    // Add your logout logic here
  }
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .v-app-bar {
    background-color: #1976d2; /* Customize your navbar color */
  }
  </style>
